Cell.Data: The DEV TEAM / MISC NOTES column contains info on what text between { } signs means (if applicable). It usually stands for either a numeric value, or a numeric value with an icon. Text between [ ] signs stands for a certain type of icon.
You failed because you lack faith. You cannot run faster than your strength of Essence, but your ineptitude disappoints us. Your devotion is suspect.
你失败了，因为你缺乏信仰。虽然你无法超越你的精华力量，但你的无能令我们感到失望，你的忠诚令人怀疑。

We need more Essence to sustain ourselves. Contributions are… hard to find. We signed a contract with willing volunteers: valuables for Essence. They took our supplies, but refused to grant us Essence. We must feed. We may be slow, but you are not. Hunt them. We trust you to make them keep their contract.
我们需要更多的精华来维持自身。贡献…太难找了。我们和心甘情愿的志愿者签订了契约：用宝物换取精华。然而，他们拿走了我们的补给，却拒绝给予我们精华。我们必须进食。我们可能很迟钝，但你并非如此。追捕他们，我们相信你可以让他们遵守契约。
Their final Essence blooms within us now. Their remains will temporarily sate our hunger. You have our gratitude, and you may keep these valuables.
他们最后的精华在我们体内绽放，他们的遗骸将暂时满足我们的饥饿。我们很感激你，这些宝物归你所有了。

Recent encounters with a rival lifeform has horrified us. Their Essence is strange. All living things are sacred, but Entropy defies Creator’s hierarchy. We hold dominion over life, and plants are its lowest form. The Growth embody Entropy’s corruption.
最近遭遇的另一种生命形式让我们感到恐惧，它们的精华十分奇怪。所有的生物都是神圣的，但混沌违背了造物主的等级制度。我们统治着生命，而植物是最低的生命形态。灵植代表着混沌的堕落。
Their vitality was especially nourishing. Come. Sup with us. Join our sacred feast. Your deeds deserve a reward.
它们的生命力特别有营养。来吧，与我们一同进食，加入我们神圣的盛宴。你的功绩值得奖赏。

Mortal infidels came into our place of entombment. They defaced our sacred lore. They stole holy crystals. Creator gave us commandments for our happiness. Stealing is forbidden. Those who abuse our commandments squander their lives and are unworthy of the Essence they hold. Prove your worthiness. Slay the thieves.
凡人之躯的异教徒来到了我们的墓地。他们玷污了我们神圣的传说，偷走了神圣的水晶。造物主为了我们的幸福给予了我们戒律。偷窃是严厉禁止的行为，那些侮辱我们戒律的人浪费了他们的生命，不配拥有他们的精华。证明你的价值，干掉那些窃贼。
We are reunited with our crystalline kindred. We savor the remains of the fallen sinners. You have proven that your Essence is worthy of our generosity.
我们与水晶中的族人团聚了，我们品味着堕落罪人的遗骸。你已经证明了你的精华值得获得我们慷慨的赠与。

Essence leaks into the earth. We try to hold it in, but our graves are restless. All around us, it escapes. The ground moves and does not obey. Essence cannot be lost. We must study these Quartzites and how they retain Essence in lifeless rock. Bring us their remains.
精华泄露进了土地，我们试图保住精华，但我们的坟墓焦躁不安。所有的精华在我们周围流失了。大地开始移动并且不愿服从。我们不能失去精华，我们必须研究这些石英岩兽，弄清楚它们为何能以没有生命的岩石形态保留住精华。把它们的遗骸带给我们。
We applaud your willingness to obey. We’ll analyze what remains. Perhaps it will lead to a better means to hold Essence. We praise thee and send blessings.
我们赞赏你服从的意愿，我们将分析剩下的遗骸。也许这些遗骸能够带领我们找到更好的精华保存方法。我们赞美你，并给予你祝福。
Synthetic Lust is not Life’s Purpose
合成的欲望并非生命的目标
摧毁所有的欢愉机器人

Our procreative instinct is Creator’s most precious gift to life. It is how we become creators ourselves. These so-called pleasure-bots are an abomination. These vulgar agents of Entropy mock the precious biological dance. They decay the sacred bonds of attraction. Keep life sacred. Dispose of them.
我们的生殖本能是造物主赋予生命的最宝贵礼物，这种能力使我们自身也成为了创造者。这些所谓的欢愉机器人令人厌恶，这些庸俗的混沌实施者嘲弄着宝贵的生命跃动，破坏了吸引的神圣纽带。保持生命的神圣，消灭它们。
Some mock, saying it matters not. In such a declaration, they prove our point. It should matter. Cherish your biological bonds. You have proven that you are a friend to life.
有些人嘲笑说这无关紧要，他们在这样的宣言中证明了我们的观点。这应该很重要。请珍惜你的生物纽带，你已经证明了你是生命的朋友。
灵能水母骗子必须消亡

Liars! Mind thieves pretend to be friendly, but inwardly they are ravening wolves. They lie about their true intentions in this realm. Do not believe their lies. They will try to turn you against us. This cannot be. We judge them Entropy’s agents. Snuff them out.
骗子！那些心灵的窃贼假装友善，但内心却是贪婪无比的豺狼。它们来到这片领域所宣称的意图全部都是谎言。不要相信它们的谎言。他们将试图让你我互相为敌。这样的事情不应发生。我们判决它们是混沌的实施者，消灭它们。
Well done, Creator’s friend. You garner our trust by destroying the mind serpents. We judge you worthy of reward.
造物主的朋友，干得漂亮！你摧毁那些心灵毒蛇的做法赢得了我们的信任，我们判定你值得奖赏。

Only we hold Creator’s rightful priesthood lineage. Only we judge the divine right to Essence. A schism threatens to usurp our authority. They say we are corrupted. They refuse to sacrifice, and pretend to know a different Creator. Stop them from spreading apostasy.
只有我们保留着造物主合法的神职血统，只有我们才拥有判决精华的神权。分裂威胁着篡夺我们的权威。他们宣称我们已经堕落。他们拒绝牺牲，还假装知道另一位不同的造物主。阻止他们传播背叛。
Well done thou good and faithful servants. You have provided the Forgotten this small boon, but Creator will reward thee with eternal glory and prestige.
很好，善良又忠心的仆人。你为被遗忘者带来了这个小小的恩惠，而造物主将会用永恒的荣耀和声誉奖赏你。

Anciently, the Paragon were instrumental in profiting from our exile and destruction. A few Paragon sought our precious Essence to revitalize their decrepit minions. They covet what we sacrificed to preserve our lives. We must feed. Destroy these traitors. Prove your loyalty to us.
从前，完人从我们的流放和毁灭中获得利益。一些完人寻求我们珍贵的精华来振兴他们腐朽的人民。他们觊觎我们用牺牲生命想要保全的东西。我们必须进食。消灭这些叛徒。证明你对我们的忠诚。
Never again will we languish in tombs, exiled to a grave, while they squander their life. Your faith in us will always be remembered.
当他们挥霍生命时，我们再也不会在坟墓中凋萎，再也不会被流放在墓穴里了。我们将永远铭记你对我们的信仰。

Friend of life, Reapers are upon us. They were created for the sole purpose of destroying our kind, and they must not disrupt our rejoicing. In the name of all holy life, heed Creator’s bidding. In this, you are free to destroy them, for they have no life within them. We beseech you, destroy them before they kill again.
生命之友，死神正在逼近我们。它们被创造出来的唯一目的，就是消灭我们的族类。它们决不能破坏我们的祥和。以所有神圣生命的名义，遵守造物主的命令。这一次，你可以大开杀戒，因为它们体内没有生命。我们恳求你，在它们再次杀戮我族之前消灭它们。
We absolve you of any guilt originating from these acts of violence. Your valiance at our behest proves you a chosen hero. We share our good will and fortune with you.
我们赦免你因这些暴力行为所犯下的罪行。你在我们要求下的英勇行为已经证明了你是一个被选中的英雄，我们将与你共享美好的祝愿和财富。
消灭自动化的混沌实施者

They have no Essence. They are lifeless idols that must be smashed. We judge them constructs of Entropy, mere distractions to life’s purpose. They are programmed for violence and take offense if we point out how meaningless they are. Destroy them.
它们没有精华。它们是没有生命的人偶，必须被粉碎。我们判决它们是混沌的造物，是对生命宗旨的干扰。它们被设定了程序，如果我们指出它们的微不足道，它们将采取暴力和攻击。消灭它们。
Well done, Champion of Life. By smiting those lifeless idols, you demonstrate your faith and refuse Entropy’s distractions. We bless thee.
干得漂亮，生命的捍卫者。你摧毁了那些没有生命的人偶，证明了你的信仰并且抵抗了混沌的干扰。我们祝福你。

We hunger for the dead. The Rot sustains us, but we lose eternal Essence with each fruitless exertion. We feel it leaking away. The crystalline vessels that hold our beloved Essence degrade too rapidly. We require your strength to preserve ours by building more vessels.
我们渴望死者。腐败支撑着我们，但每一次徒劳的努力都会使我们失去永恒的精华。我们感觉得到精华正在流失。保存我们精华的水晶容器正在迅速退化，我们需要你的帮助来建造更多的容器保存我们的精华。
Praise be to Creator for your mercy on us. We are stronger due to your vivacity. We thank you with gifts of the finest wares, and blessings from on high.
感谢造物主让你给予我们仁慈。因为你的活力，我们变得更加强大。我们感谢你，并将赠与你最精致的礼物和来自造物主的祝福。
Build a stockpile of Crystal Essence Chambers so that the Forgotten’s Essence will not leak away and be lost to them.
建造一个水晶精华室，使被遗忘者的精华不会泄漏和流失。
Build a Shrine to our Fallen
为我们的死者建造一座神庙

We remember Entropy’s malice, how it raged in the hearts of people. Their fear dashed our kind to pieces and destroyed our precious legacy. We miss them. We yearn to never forget them. Others must know the cost of fear. They must know our loss. Build a monument in their honor.
我们记得混沌的恶意，记得它是在人们心中肆虐的方式。恐惧使我们族人分崩离析，摧毁了我们宝贵的遗产。我们怀念他们，我们希望永远也不要忘记他们。其他人必须了解恐惧的代价，必须了解我们失去的东西。建造一个纪念碑纪念死者。
Nothing is more tragic to immortals than death. Becoming lost and gone is a terrible fate. We value your effort. It does not bring them back, but perhaps it will prevent another slaughter.
对永生者来说，没有什么比死亡更悲惨的了。迷失和逝去是一种可怕的命运。我们重视你的努力。虽然这并不能使他们复生，但也许可以防止更多的杀戮。
被遗忘者的逝者纪念碑
Build a monument to the Forgotten’s dead in the days when they were hunted and destroyed.
为被遗忘者的死者建立一个纪念碑，祭奠曾经遭到追杀的日子。

We hunger, not for the meat of pigs, but for the Essence they squander. Destroy their fleshy forms, break down their stalls and scatter them upon the land. We will feed upon their remains. This will sate us, and we won’t require other ‘food’ sources… for now.
我们饥肠辘辘，并非是渴望猪肉，而是渴望它们浪费的精华。破坏它们的肉身，毁掉它们的畜栏，把它们丢在地上。我们将以它们的遗骸为食。这将满足我们。我们不需要其他的“食物”…至少暂时不需要。
Savory Essence fills us with fervor. Our legions are gorged upon the fallen swine. We thank thee with this favor.
美味的精华使我们充满了激情。我们的军团狼吞虎咽地吸收了猪的精华。我们对你的帮助表示感谢。

The consumption decreed shall be upon the locusts of the air. A nest of them so close to our chambers will only infest our tranquil tombs. Please slay the Hopperhounds and break down their nest. We will feed upon the fallen, and together we will prosper.
空中的那些蝗虫应当遭到吞噬的制裁。它们的一个巢穴离我们很近，污染了我们宁静的坟墓。请帮助我们杀死那些跳蝗并摧毁它们的巢穴。我们将以死掉的跳蝗为食。齐心协力，我们将共同繁荣。
The land is tranquil. The Hopperhounds’ Essence restores us. The fields are free to be claimed by thy kind. Let us rejoice in the bounty of this land. Enjoy our blessing.
这片土地恢复了宁静。跳蝗的精华补给了我们。你的族类可以自由地占有这些土地。我们为这片土地的富饶而欢欣鼓舞。请接受我们的祝福。
摧毁石英岩兽的出生点

This earth disrupts our crystalline technology. Set the land right again. Restore it to a sustainable form. We cannot abide the Quartzite Spawner. Who among you stands faithful? We wait in judgment for allies. Prove your worth to our cause, and our blessings will be bountiful.
这片土地干扰了我们的水晶科技。让这片土地恢复正常，恢复到生态平衡的状态。我们无法容忍石英岩兽的出生点。你们中间谁拥有信仰？我们在判决中等待我们的盟友。向我们证明你的价值，我们的祝福将无比慷慨。
The tranquil earth returns to our dominion. Blessed be Creator. We bless you and your kin. Take this boon.
我们重新掌控了平静的土地。赞美造物主。我们祝福你和你的族类。请收下这份恩惠。

Horror of horrors, Entropy’s greatest abominations stalk the lands! These constructs of enmity must not be permitted to roam freely. We demand that all who cherish life and wish to gain our blessing do everything within their power to eradicate these intruders.
恐怖中的恐怖，混沌最可怕的造物正在大地上肆虐！决不能允许这些仇恶之物自由地游荡。我们要求所有珍惜生命并希望得到我们祝福的人尽其所能消灭这些入侵者。
You have proven yourself our most trusted and worthy ally. We seek to reward you for destroying those wicked machines.
你向我们证明了你是最值得信赖的盟友。你摧毁了那些邪恶的机器，我们会奖励你的。

We are at a loss after all these years sealed in seclusion. What has become of our once great Empire? Open unto us your historical databases. Give us access to your knowledge that we may become knowledgeable about the remnants of civilization that persist in this time.
在与世隔绝了这么多年之后，我们感到茫然。我们曾经的伟大帝国现在怎么样了？向我们开放你的历史数据库，让我们接触到你们的知识，这样我们就可以对这个时代遗留下来的文明遗迹有所了解。
Enough. We are sickened by the waste and tragic loss of life— and so many needless deaths wasted—since our exile. It is a terrible age. Nonetheless, we appreciate your candor and reward you.
已经足够了。我们自流亡以来，竟然有如此多的生命遭到浪费或是悲惨地逝去，还有如此多不必要的死亡，我们感到厌恶。这是一个可怕的时代。尽管如此，我们还是感谢你的坦诚。这是你的奖励。
Research History and present it to the Forgotten in graphical slides that even ancient life-eating zealots can understand.
研究历史并用图形幻灯片展示给被遗忘者，让这些吞食生命的古代狂热者了解历史。
Research methods of scanning for Essence

We smell the Essence of life all around us. We seek a way to locate Essence that will not offend our friends and allies. We must have better means to scan for Essence among the many hazards of this time. Please help us with our research so that we do not accidentally target you for siphoning.
我们嗅到了我们周围的生命精华。我们正在寻找一种能够找到精华但同时又不会冒犯朋友和盟友的方法。在这个时代的诸多危险中，我们必须用更好的方法来寻找精华。请帮助我们完成研究，这样一来我们就不会一不小心将你们作为汲取的目标了。
We see the vibrant glow of Essence all around us. With this increased understanding, we’ll be able to detect and preserve more Essence. Enjoy our blessings.
我们看到精华在我们周围发出生机勃勃的光芒。随着理解的加深，我们将能够发现并保存更多的精华。请接受我们的祝福。
Research a scanner capable of detecting fine-grade sources of Essence so that the Forgotten can more easily discern from whom they siphon life.
研究一种能够侦测优质精华的扫描仪，这样被遗忘者就能更容易地辨别他们汲取生命的目标。
Research popular trends for the Forgotten
为被遗忘者研究流行趋势

We seek your aid in popularizing trends toward not wasting one’s life, but rather donating it to the Forgotten. Misery should never be extended when it can serve a much higher purpose; namely, our enrichment.
我们寻求你的帮助，希望能够普及一种不再浪费生命，而是把生命捐献给被遗忘者的趋势。当痛苦可以达成更高的目标时，就不应该被延长。而这样的目标换句话说，就是让我们变得富足。
We thank thee for your insights. Mortals worship the young and nubile, but now we are trending. Here is your payment.
我们感谢你的洞察力。凡人崇尚年轻和美丽，但现在我们才是趋势。这是你的报酬。

Seeking to be seen as more than just life-sucking monsters, the Forgotten wish to be portrayed in our popular culture as heroes. We can change minds by casting the Essence they take from our undesirables in a favorable light.
被遗忘者不希望被人们视为吞噬生命的怪物，而是希望被描绘成我们流行文化中的英雄。让他们汲取我们中那些不良分子的精华，给人们一个好印象，从而改变人们对他们的看法。

In the text below, text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.

In the text below, any inserted strings - anything of the form {text} - is replaced by an integer value for the thing described in the brackets. If the {text} is not followed by a unit - e.g. shields, hitpoints - the icon for the unit is inserted together with the integer. The same holds for symbols - e.g. '+', '%' - which are occasionally inserted together with the integer.
For references to game terminology and in-world references, please check the glossary delivered as part of the documentation.

The Growth are a sentient botanical species. They speak poetically, using puns and metaphors to describe things and speak romantically. They use the word "symbiosis" to refer to their relationships with other races and species. The "Mother Node" is their leader, and they refer to her in such.
